alert.note: Alert for Dane; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:35AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Dane and southeastern Sauk Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 534 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a scattered strong thunderstorms from Sauk City to Maple Bluff, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Madison, Sun Prairie, Middleton, Waunakee, McFarland, Monona, Windsor, Prairie Du Sac, Marshall, Sauk City, Deforest, Cottage Grove, Cross Plains, Deerfield, Mazomanie, Shorewood Hills, Cambridge, Maple Bluff, Dane, and Utica. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39/90/94 between mile markers 127 and 137. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 249 and 252, and between mile markers 263 and 273. U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 98 and 106. Interstate 39/90 between mile markers 138 and 153. Interstate 94 between mile markers 241 and 254. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
